string-array.name: attractions_description
string-array.item: If you do not have the courage, do not try to get on this roller coaster at all! It will sweep you into a breathtaking gallop, accompanied by dizzying loops, sharp descents and twisting screws, almost unstoppable. Wait, wait: now make it all the way back by galloping backwards!
An amusement facility that includes a standing wheel and passenger compartments that hang on its perimeter
Only 5 daring pirates can sit on each bench. The journey is not simple the ship will move in a semicircle dozens of times, back and forth. A fun, experiential and exciting facility.
New cars of various types are waiting for you, but we do not need a drivers license! You can accelerate, turn around and collide as you wish
The four slides will take you downstream for an exciting experience that you will want to return to again and again. The slides are red for the little ones, the blue ones for the bigger ones.

For the brave only! From the moment you sit down and fasten your seat belts, everything will happen at an insane speed: turn over, get stuck in the air with your head down and your feet up, turn 360 degrees and more .
The king of extreme facilities, for the brave among you 360 degree inversion operation, rises to a height of 25 meters and allows you to almost touch the clouds!

A carousel is a type of amusement ride consisting of a rotating circular platform with seats for riders. The "seats" are traditionally in the form of rows of wooden horses or other animals mounted on posts
The swing ride is an amusement ride that is a variation on the carousel in which the seats are suspended from the rotating top of the carousel.

An elevator that rises to a height of 65 meters and has 16 seats. On each trip, the sixteen passengers will ascend at high speed to the end and from there a rapid descent down and back for goodness sake.
